column5: This Saturday, I'll be heading to Trenton with my brother for the first time. We are not too familiar with the area and I was wondering if anyone can tell me where we can find shore fishing along Bay of Quinte or near the town. Any help is much appreciated.

You can fish the Trent River from almost everywhere in the town. Below the dams at most of the locks is a good starting point.  The mouth of the Trent where it flows into the Bay of Quinte has lots of shoreline to fish also.
